titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: At last Dr Evelyn pronounced me capable of travelling, and took his departure. I dressed, and wrote to Ralph cancelling my sermon at St Paul's on July 11th. After lunch we went off to Darlington, where we were met by the car, and driven to Auckland Castle.
